nodes.bodyText: ahh good catch. We should wrap this setter in a updateType check. The impact would not have been noticeable as no one is using the recovery feature it's used in currently.  Also can we also set this latest version info from the playstore update API for in-app updates ?

can we also set this latest version info from the playstore update API for in-app updates?

Yeah, I think we can get the versionCode from the playstore api https://developer.android.com/reference/com/google/android/play/core/appupdate/AppUpdateInfo#availableVersionCode(), but not the version name.
ok we do need the version name here to be compatible with the surrounding code.
